message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't afford it at $11,500. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand the value of the product, but I am unable to agree to $11,000. Could you possibly lower the price to $10,500?
